scripts.deploy: CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=8ed4d03ac99f77561d0e8c9cbcc76cb6 npx wrangler pages publish ./dist --branch main --project-name d1-todos-qwik-city
scripts.setup-db: npx wrangler d1 execute D1_TODOS_DB --local --command 'CREATE TABLE if not exists TODOS (id CHAR PRIMARY KEY, text CHAR, completed CHAR, sessionId CHAR, date CHAR);'
scripts.dev.wrangler: sleep 3; cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx wrangler pages dev ./dist  --port 8700 --d1 D1_TODOS_DB --live-reload --persist
scripts.predev: npm run build ; npm run setup-db
scripts.dev.wrangler.open: sleep 3; cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx wrangler pages dev ./dist --open --port 8700 --d1 D1_TODOS_DB --live-reload --persist
